alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern El Paso and north central Pueblo Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 532 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pueblo West, or near Pueblo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Pueblo West, Pinon, Pueblo Reservoir, Avondale and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
